EmailTemplate.name: Serpentine Gallery Pavilion 2015 Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: REMINDER: Join AECOM at the Serpentine Gallery Pavilion
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
INVITE: AECOM at the Serpentine Pavilion
Serpentine Pavilion 2015: Private view
We recently sent you an invitation to join us on Thursday 23 July to celebrate the 15th - and our third - Serpentine Pavilion in the beautiful setting of Kensington Gardens.
We don't appear to have heard from you yet, but do hope you can join us. The evening will now also feature AECOM's Virtual Reality team, who will be running a VR booth. Travel through time with our leading-edge virtual environment and immerse yourself in the last three Serpentine Pavilions.
Architecture by selgascano Engineering and technical design, cost management and project management by AECOM
More information about this year's Serpentine Pavilion [http://www.aecom.com/News/Innovation/Serpentine+Pavilion+2015]
On: Thursday 23 July, 6.30pm - 9.30pm
At: Serpentine Gallery Kensingston Gardens London W2 3XA
RSVP by email [RSVPserpentine.europe@aecom.com], or telephone 020 3170 2782.
By invitation only and non-transferable.
